data.name: BUSCA_ARQUIVO_PPF_ORDEM
data.value: select JOB_CAM_FILE, JOB_CAD_FILE from TS_JOB where JOB_JOB_DESCRIPTION = @JOB

data.name: BUSCA_IMAGENS_POR_JOBID
data.value: select JBP_JOB_IMAGE_ID, JBP_IMAGE_DESC as 'Descrição da imagem', JBP_IMAGE_BLOB from TS_JOB_IMAGES where JBP_JOB_ID=@JOBID

data.name: BUSCA_QTDE_USED_TOOL
data.value: SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(SKA_TL3.TL_TOOL_DESCRIPTION), 0) AS TL_QTDE_USED FROM TS_JOB AS SKA_TL1 INNER JOIN TS_MOUNTING AS SKA_TL2 ON SKA_TL1.JOB_JOB_DESCRIPTION = SKA_TL2.MNT_JOB_DESC INNER JOIN TS_TOOL AS SKA_TL3 ON SKA_TL2.MNT_TOOL_ID = SKA_TL3.TL_TOOL_ID INNER JOIN TS_JOB_INSTRUCTION AS SKA_TL4 ON SKA_TL4.JBI_JOB_DESC=SKA_TL2.MNT_JOB_DESC AND SKA_TL4.JBI_TURRET_POSITION = SKA_TL2.MNT_TURRET_POSITION WHERE SKA_TL3.TL_TOOL_ID = @TOOLID GROUP BY SKA_TL3.TL_TOOL_ID , SKA_TL3.TL_TOOL_DESCRIPTION, SKA_TL3.TL_TOOL_ID
data.comment: Utilizado para consultar a quantidade de ferramentas utilizadas.

data.name: CADASTRA_NOVO_TRABALHO
CANCELA_TRABALHO
data.value: update TS_JOB set JOB_JOB_STATUS_ID = 5 WHERE JOB_JOB_DESCRIPTION = @JOBNAME

data.name: CONSULTA_BRUTOS
data.value: SELECT T1.STOCK_STOCK_ID AS 'Id', T1.STOCK_TYPE_ID AS 'Tipo_db', T1.STOCK_REFID AS 'Nome', ( SELECT MAT_MATERIAL_DESCRIPTION FROM TS_MATERIAL WHERE MAT_MATERIAL_ID = T1.STOCK_MATERIAL_ID ) AS 'Material', T1.STOCK_LENGTH AS 'Comprimento' FROM TS_STOCKS AS T1 WHERE T1.STOCK_REFID != ''

data.name: CONSULTA_CNCS
data.value: SELECT T1.JOB_JOB_DESCRIPTION, ISNULL(T1.JOB_NC_FILE, 'CNC não localizado') AS JOB_NC_FILE, T1.JOB_MODIFIED FROM TS_JOB AS T1 WHERE T1.JOB_JOB_DESCRIPTION<>'<All Kit>'

data.name: CONSULTA_FAMILIAS
data.value: select distinct JOB_FAMILY from TS_JOB where JOB_FAMILY IS NOT NULL

data.name: CONSULTA_INSTRUCOES_TRABALHO
data.value: --Consulta as instruções do trabalho referênciado select JBI_INSTRUCTION as 'Ordem', JBI_INSTRUCTION_TYPE_ID as 'Tipo_Instru_Db', JBI_INSTRUCTION_DESC as 'Descrição', JBI_SPEED as 'Velocidade (RPM)', JBI_FEED as 'Avanço lateral', JBI_PLUNGE as 'Avanço vertical', JBI_TIME as 'Tempo do processo' from TS_JOB_INSTRUCTION where JBI_INSTRUCTION_TYPE_ID IN (0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5) and JBI_JOB_DESC = @JOBNAME

data.name: CONSULTA_MATERIAIS
data.value: select MAT_MATERIAL_ID, MAT_MATERIAL_DESCRIPTION, MAT_COMMENT from TS_MATERIAL

data.name: CONSULTA_TEMPOS_FERRAMENTA_POR_JOB
data.value: SELECT T3.TL_TOOL_DESCRIPTION AS 'Nome da ferramenta', T4.JBI_TURRET_POSITION AS 'Posição na torre', SUBSTRING(T4.JBI_TIME, 11, 8) AS 'Tempo total de usinagem', ( SELECT TMP1.JBI_INSTRUCTION_DESC FROM TS_JOB_INSTRUCTION AS TMP1 WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE TMP1.JBI_JOB_INSTRUCTION_ID = T4.JBI_JOB_INSTRUCTION_ID + 1 ) AS 'Estratégia', T4.JBI_INSTRUCTION AS 'Ordem de execução da estratégia' FROM TS_JOB AS T1 INNER JOIN TS_MOUNTING AS T2 ON T1.JOB_JOB_DESCRIPTION = T2.MNT_JOB_DESC INNER JOIN TS_TOOL AS T3 ON T2.MNT_TOOL_ID = T3.TL_TOOL_ID INNER JOIN TS_JOB_INSTRUCTION AS T4 ON T4.JBI_JOB_DESC=T2.MNT_JOB_DESC AND T4.JBI_TURRET_POSITION = T2.MNT_TURRET_POSITION WHERE --T1.JOB_JOB_DESCRIPTION <> '<All Kit>' AND T2.MNT_TOOL_ID = T3.TL_TOOL_ID --AND --T4.JBI_TIME IS NOT NULL AND --T1.JOB_JOB_DESCRIPTION = @JOB

data.name: CONSULTA_TOOLS_ADDITIVE
data.value: select DISTINCT T1.TL_TOOL_DESCRIPTION AS 'Descrição', T1.TL_TOOL_ID AS 'id', T1.TL_TOOL_TYPE_ADDITIVE_ID AS 'Tipo_Db', T1.TL_UNITS_ID AS 'Unidade_Db', T1.TL_DIAMETER AS 'Diâmetro', T1.TL_VISIBILITY AS 'Visibilidade' FROM TS_TOOL AS T1 WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN TS_MOUNTING AS T2 ON T2.MNT_TOOL_ID=T1.TL_TOOL_ID

data.name: CONSULTA_TOOLS_BY_JOB
data.value: /* T1 - TS_JOB (DADOS GERAIS DO TRABALHO) T2 - TS_MOUNTING (MONTAGENS DE FERRAMENTAS) T3 - TS_TOOL (FERRAMENTAS) T4 - TS_JOB_INSTRUCTION (INSTRUÇÕES */ SELECT T2.MNT_TURRET_POSITION AS 'Posição', T3.TL_TOOL_DESCRIPTION AS 'Nome da ferramenta', --Ferramentas de fresamento ISNULL(T3.TL_TOOL_TYPE_MILL_ID, -1) AS TL_TOOL_TYPE_MILL_ID, ISNULL(T3.TL_DIAMETER, 0) AS 'Diâmetro', --Ferramentas de torneamento ISNULL(T3.TL_TOOL_TYPE_TURN_ID, -1) AS TL_TOOL_TYPE_TURN_ID, ISNULL(T3.TL_SYMBOL_ID, -1) AS TL_SYMBOL_ID, --Ferramentas de furação ISNULL(T3.TL_TOOL_TYPE_HOLE_ID, -1) AS TL_TOOL_TYPE_HOLE_ID, T3.TL_UNITS_ID AS 'Unidade_Db', T4.JBI_TIME AS 'Tempo_Db' FROM TS_JOB AS T1 INNER JOIN TS_MOUNTING AS T2 ON T1.JOB_JOB_DESCRIPTION = T2.MNT_JOB_DESC INNER JOIN TS_TOOL AS T3 ON T2.MNT_TOOL_ID = T3.TL_TOOL_ID INNER JOIN TS_JOB_INSTRUCTION AS T4 ON T4.JBI_JOB_DESC=T2.MNT_JOB_DESC AND T4.JBI_TURRET_POSITION =T2.MNT_TURRET_POSITION WHERE (T1.JOB_JOB_DESCRIPTION <> '<All Kit>') and (T1.JOB_JOB_ID = @JOBID)

data.name: CONSULTA_TOOLS_HOLE
data.value: select DISTINCT T1.TL_TOOL_DESCRIPTION AS 'Descrição', T1.TL_TOOL_ID AS 'id', T1.TL_TOOL_TYPE_HOLE_ID AS 'Tipo_Db', T1.TL_TEETH AS 'Dentes', T1.TL_UNITS_ID AS 'Unidade_Db', ISNULL(T1.TL_HAND_OF_THREAD_ID, 0) AS 'LadoFerramenta_Db', ISNULL(T1.TL_THREAD, 0) AS 'Passo',--Thread Pitch / TPI ISNULL(T1.TL_THREAD_STORED_ID, 2) AS 'TipoRosca_Db',--0 - TPI (The number of threads per inch.) / 1 - Pitch / 2- N/A T1.TL_DIAMETER AS 'Diâmetro', T1.TL_VISIBILITY AS 'Visibilidade', T2.MNT_ROUGHING_TOOL AS 'Para desbaste', T2.MNT_FINISHING_TOOL AS 'Para acabamento' FROM TS_TOOL AS T1 WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN TS_MOUNTING AS T2 ON T2.MNT_TOOL_ID=T1.TL_TOOL_ID

data.name: CONSULTA_TOOLS_INSTRUCOES
data.value: SELECT TS_MOUNTING.MNT_TURRET_POSITION, CONCAT('T', ISNULL(TS_MOUNTING.MNT_TURRET_POSITION, 0), ' - ', TS_TOOL.TL_TOOL_DESCRIPTION) as TL_TOOL_DESCRIPTION, ISNULL(TS_TOOL.TL_TOOL_TYPE_MILL_ID, -1) AS TL_TOOL_TYPE_MILL_ID, ISNULL(TS_TOOL.TL_TOOL_TYPE_TURN_ID, -1) AS TL_TOOL_TYPE_TURN_ID, ISNULL(TS_TOOL.TL_TOOL_TYPE_HOLE_ID, -1) AS TL_TOOL_TYPE_HOLE_ID FROM TS_JOB INNER JOIN TS_MOUNTING ON TS_JOB.JOB_JOB_DESCRIPTION = TS_MOUNTING.MNT_JOB_DESC INNER JOIN TS_TOOL ON TS_MOUNTING.MNT_TOOL_ID = TS_TOOL.TL_TOOL_ID INNER JOIN TS_JOB_INSTRUCTION ON JBI_JOB_DESC=MNT_JOB_DESC AND JBI_TURRET_POSITION = MNT_TURRET_POSITION WHERE TS_JOB_INSTRUCTION.JBI_JOB_DESC = @JOBNAME order by TS_JOB_INSTRUCTION.JBI_JOB_INSTRUCTION_ID

data.name: CONSULTA_TOOLS_MILL
data.value: SELECT DISTINCT T1.TL_TOOL_DESCRIPTION AS 'Descrição', T1.TL_TOOL_ID AS 'id', T1.TL_TOOL_TYPE_MILL_ID AS 'Tipo_Db', T1.TL_UNITS_ID AS 'Unidade_Db', T1.TL_DIAMETER AS 'Diâmetro', T1.TL_VISIBILITY AS 'Visibilidade', T2.MNT_ROUGHING_TOOL AS 'Para desbaste', T2.MNT_FINISHING_TOOL AS 'Para acabamento' FROM TS_TOOL AS T1 WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN TS_MOUNTING AS T2 ON T2.MNT_TOOL_ID=T1.TL_TOOL_ID

data.name: CONSULTA_TOOLS_PROBE
data.value: select DISTINCT T1.TL_TOOL_DESCRIPTION AS 'Descrição', T1.TL_TOOL_ID AS 'id', T1.TL_TOOL_TYPE_PROBE_ID AS 'Tipo_Db', T1.TL_UNITS_ID AS 'Unidade_Db', T1.TL_DIAMETER AS 'Diâmetro', T1.TL_VISIBILITY AS 'Visibilidade', T2.MNT_GAUGE_POINT_ID AS 'PontoDefasagem_Db'--0 Primário / 1 Secundário (no meio) FROM TS_TOOL AS T1 WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN TS_MOUNTING AS T2 ON T2.MNT_TOOL_ID=T1.TL_TOOL_ID

data.name: CONSULTA_TOOLS_TURN
data.value: select DISTINCT T1.TL_TOOL_DESCRIPTION AS 'Descrição', T1.TL_TOOL_ID AS 'id', T1.TL_TOOL_TYPE_TURN_ID AS 'Tipo_Db', ISNULL(T1.TL_SYMBOL_ID, 0) AS 'Símbolo_Db', T1.TL_UNITS_ID AS 'Unidade_Db', ISNULL(T1.TL_HAND_OF_TOOL_ID, 0) AS 'LadoFerramenta_Db', T1.TL_VISIBILITY AS 'Visibilidade', T2.MNT_ROUGHING_TOOL AS 'Para desbaste', T2.MNT_FINISHING_TOOL AS 'Para acabamento' FROM TS_TOOL AS T1 WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN TS_MOUNTING AS T2 ON T2.MNT_TOOL_ID=T1.TL_TOOL_ID

data.name: CONSULTA_TRABALHOS
data.value: select JOB_JOB_ID as 'id', JOB_JOB_DESCRIPTION as 'Nome do trabalho', JOB_COMMENT as 'Comentário', JOB_FAMILY as 'Familía', JOB_SEQUENCE as 'Sequência', JOB_LOCATION as 'Máquina', JOB_CUSTOMER as 'Cliente', JOB_PROGRAMMER as 'Programador', JOB_MATERIAL_DESC as 'Material', JOB_JOB_STATUS_ID as 'Status_Db', JOB_CAM_FILE as 'Arquivo PPF', JOB_CAD_FILE as 'Arquivo CAD', JOB_NC_FILE as 'Arquivo CNC', JOB_PREDEFINED_TOOLING as 'Pré-carga de ferramentas', JOB_REVISION as 'Revisão', JOB_CYCLE_TIME as 'Tempo de usinagem', JOB_NOTES_SUBJECT, JOB_NOTES_FILE, JOB_NOTES, JOB_FIXTURE_NOTES_SUBJECT, JOB_FIXTURE_NOTES_FILE, JOB_FIXTURE_NOTES, JOB_STOCK_NOTES_SUBJECT, JOB_STOCK_NOTES_FILE, JOB_STOCK_NOTES, JOB_VISIBILITY as 'Visibilidaed_Db', JOB_CREATED as 'Data de criação', JOB_MODIFIED as 'Data da última modificação', JOB_STICKOUT from TS_JOB where JOB_JOB_DESCRIPTION <> '<All Kit>'

data.name: CONSULTA_ULTIMO_JOB_ID
data.value: select top 1 T1.JOB_JOB_ID from TS_JOB AS T1 order by T1.JOB_JOB_ID desc

data.name: CONSULTA_USABILIDADE_TOOLS_IN_JOBS
data.value: SELECT T1.JOB_JOB_DESCRIPTION AS 'Nome do trabalho', T1.JOB_SEQUENCE as 'Sequência', COUNT(T3.TL_TOOL_ID) AS 'Quantidade de vezes utilizada no trabalho' FROM TS_JOB AS T1 INNER JOIN TS_MOUNTING AS T2 ON T1.JOB_JOB_DESCRIPTION = T2.MNT_JOB_DESC INNER JOIN TS_TOOL AS T3 ON T2.MNT_TOOL_ID = T3.TL_TOOL_ID INNER JOIN TS_JOB_INSTRUCTION AS T4 ON T4.JBI_JOB_DESC=T2.MNT_JOB_DESC AND T4.JBI_TURRET_POSITION = T2.MNT_TURRET_POSITION WHERE T1.JOB_JOB_DESCRIPTION <> '<All Kit>' AND --T3.TL_TOOL_ID = 3219 T3.TL_TOOL_ID = @TOOL_ID GROUP BY T1.JOB_JOB_DESCRIPTION, T1.JOB_SEQUENCE
data.comment: Utilizado no formulário 'FrmFerramentas_Rastreio' -Pode ser utilizado para qualquer ferramenta.

data.name: DELETA_IMAGEM_BANCO_POR_ID
data.value: delete from TS_JOB_IMAGES where JBP_JOB_IMAGE_ID=@IDIMG

data.name: DELETA_TRABALHOS_E_VINCULOS
data.value: delete from TS_JOB where JOB_JOB_ID = @JOBID delete from TS_JOB_DESC where JBD_JOB_DESC = @JOBNAME delete from TS_JOB_IMAGES where JBP_JOB_ID = @JOBID delete from TS_JOB_INSTRUCTION where JBI_JOB_DESC = @JOBID

data.name: INSERE_MAGEM_EDGECAM
